authors.name: National Institute On Money In State Politics

title: Follow The Money: National Institute On Money In State Politics
description: FollowTheMoney.org collects and makes freely available comprehensive state and federal political spending data, including direct contributions, independent spending, and lobbying expenditures. The 2018 state elections are on track to break spending records, with national players set to spend big. The outcomes will largely determine who holds the redistricting pen following the 2020 Census.
